name: Poker Puzzle (2016)
description:
Click and drag to select 5 contiguous cards (diagonals count) and release to make a 5-card poker hand. Face-down cards are random draws, and a face-down card with 2x/3x on it offers a multiplier on the hand's point value. Play until the standard player card deck is exhausted. You'll have 2 cards left over and there's no end condition, just refresh to play again.

The Puzzle Poker prototype was created by Patrick Kemp. Powered by luxe.
